text: XHPCPG-FM is a radio station on 98.1 FM in Chilpancingo, Guerrero. It is an owned-and-operated station of Grupo Imagen's Imagen Radio network. ==History== XHPCPG was awarded in the IFT-4 radio auction of 2017 as one of two Chilpancingo frequencies in the auction. Grupo Imagen paid 2 million pesos. The station signed on in early 2019. ==References== ==External links== Category:Radio stations in Guerrero Category:Radio stations established in 2019 Category:2019 establishments in Mexico
title: XHPCPG-FM
